article_metadata.author: Ken Kam

og.description: Investors in Gilead Sciences (NASDAQ: GILD) have seen their investments grow 35% per year for the past five years, and 58% over the last 12 months. Since our conversation about Gilead with Eugene Groysman in June, the stock has appreciated 29%. After a stock has done this well, it is only natural to ask whether it can keep going, or whether it’s time to sell. To answer that question, I talked to 2 Marketocracy Masters, Eugene Groysman and Mike Koza, to discuss whether Gilead can double again.
og.title: Can Gilead Double From Here?
